tso_tariff_calculator_url_remarks: Regulation (EC) No 715/2009, Annex I Point 3.4.(6) information
multi_annual_contracts_remarks: Multi Annual Contracts are offered on a "First-Come-First-Served"-basis.
general_tariff_information_remarks: For information about the currently applied tariffs, please refer to the official website of Fluxys Deutschland on http://www.fluxys.com/nel/en/NetworkAccess/TermsAndConditions
first_come_first_served_remarks: Interruptible capacity is offered on a "First-come-first-served" basis.
tso_general_remarks: All data published by Fluxys Deutschland are indicative and for information purposes only and no rights or obligations may be withdrawn from this information. The use of the information is at user's own risk and Fluxys Deutschland cannot be held liable fo
b_m_status_information: Balancing group managers are provided with: hourly time series about quantities allocated to a balancing group (at maximum per balancing account) and hourly time series about difference quantities for his own balancing group and for respective sub-balanci
b_m_status_information_frequency: Daily SLP (Standard Load Profiles): Today for D+1. RLM (Registered Power Metering): Today for D-1. Intraday at 19:00 for the first 6 hours of the gas day. All other entry and exit nomination (allocations) today for D-1. Complete status information on bala
b_m_penalties: In case of imbalanced balancing groups at the end of a gas day the balancing group network operator shall pay a charge amounting to the second lowest (highest) selling price of the reference prices multiplied by 0.9 (1.1) to the balancing group manager if
b_m_cash_out_regime: Monthly cash-out on a daily basis. The responsible balancing network operator balances the accounts without any tolerances with the responsible balancing group manager on the basis of the relevant reference gas price for the settlement of daily imbalances
b_m_remarks: The Market Area Operator for Fluxys Deutschland is GasPool
transparency_guidelines_information_url_: Regulation (EC) No 715/2009, Annex I Chapter 3 information
